tmlib.tmaps.workflow module¶

class tmlib.tmaps.workflow.Workflow(experiment, virtualenv, verbosity)[source]¶

Bases: gc3libs.workflow.SequentialTaskCollection, gc3libs.workflow.StopOnError

commands¶

Build a command in the form of a list of argument strings as required by the parse_args() method.

Returns:command for each step of the workflow
Return type:List[List[str]]

Note

Arguments can be set in the user configuration file.

next(done)[source]¶

Progress to the next step of the workflow.

Parameters:done (int) – zero-based index of the last processed step
Returns:
Return type:gc3libs.Run.State
class tmlib.tmaps.workflow.WorkflowStepArgs(name=None, args=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

args¶
Returns:arguments required by the step (arguments that can be parsed to the “init” method of the corresponding cli class)
Return type:dict

Note

Default values defined by the corresponding init subparser will be used in case an optional argument is not provided.

See also

`tmlib.cli`_

name¶
Returns:name of the step
Return type:str

Note

Must correspond to a name of a tmlib command line program (subpackage).
